acceptedAnswer.text: AI agents are intelligent software programs that can understand, learn, and perform tasks autonomously. They use natural language processing and machine learning to interact with users, automate workflows, and make decisions.

mainEntity.name: How do AI chatbots improve customer service?

acceptedAnswer.text: AI chatbots provide 24/7 customer support, instantly answer common questions, route complex queries to human agents, and learn from interactions to improve over time. This reduces response times and operational costs while improving customer satisfaction.

Conversational AI combines natural language processing (NLP), machine learning, and dialogue management to enable human-like conversations between computers and people. It powers chatbots, virtual assistants, and voice interfaces.
